Subject: Heritrix 2.0 web UI does not remember remote engines added
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=343342970

Hello, I searched JIRA and found no open bugs for this.

When I launch the Web UI (either with or without an associated local
engine), and add a remote engine controlled by JMX, everytime I shut
down the web UI and restart it, the remote engines are lost. I have to
add them again, which becomes boring...

Am I doing something wrong or is it just that there is no persistence
associated with remote engines? In this case, it should be
implemented, can I raise a feature request?

Cheers

Jean-Noel
